last_episode_to_air.name: German Jihad & The EURO Plot
last_episode_to_air.overview: A horrific terrorist plot -- suicide bombers and shooters working in tandem -- is foiled when a suspect makes an unexpected move.

name: Terrorism Close Calls
overview: The war on terror is everywhere and anywhere. In this series, we learn about the deadly terrorist attacks that almost happened or were not as deadly as planned. Each episodes explores a recently declassified terrorist scheme intended to cause mass casualties.

episodes.name: The NY City Subway Plot
episodes.overview: As three young terrorists finalize plans to detonate bombs on New York City's subway, law enforcement agencies work tirelessly to halt the attacks.

episodes.name: The Student Bomb Maker
episodes.overview: A suspicious online purchase helps start the FBI's investigation into a chemical engineering student's quest to inflict horrendous damage on America.

episodes.name: Cargo Bomb Plot
episodes.overview: A number of international intelligence agencies work together to thwart a terrorist scheme to blow up American cargo planes in flight.

episodes.name: Operation Chevrolet: The Plot to Kill Saudi Ambassador
episodes.overview: A car salesman plans to assassinate the Saudi Ambassador to the U.S. with some help from a Mexican cartel member -- who happens to be a DEA source.

episodes.name: Operation Overt: The Transatlantic Liquid Bomb Plot
episodes.overview: Suicide bombers plan to use explosive liquids disguised in sports drinks to blow up at least seven separate planes bound for North America.

episodes.name: Martin Luther King Day Plot
episodes.overview: A man with ties to white supremacists goes on the run after his plan to bomb a Martin Luther King Day march is foiled by the FBI.

episodes.name: The Sauerland Cell: Plot to Kill U.S. Soldiers
episodes.overview: Four terrorists plan a two-pronged attack in Germany: detonate bombs in popular nightclubs, followed by larger bombs in the streets once people flee.

episodes.name: The Israel Honey Trap
episodes.overview: A young mother's suicide attack at an Israeli checkpoint ignites interest in her motivations as well as her baffling backstory.

episodes.name: Australian Anzac Day Plot
episodes.overview: The arrest of a 14-year-old boy in England sparks a frantic investigation into a terror plot halfway around the world in Australia.

episodes.name: German Jihad & The EURO Plot
episodes.overview: A horrific terrorist plot -- suicide bombers and shooters working in tandem -- is foiled when a suspect makes an unexpected move.
